tool_description: The world's most popular flight tracker API which helps you to create Flight tracker application, such as : flightradar24.com
title: Flight Radar

api_list.name: flights/list-in-boundary
api_list.description: Helps to list flights, aircrafts in a GEO bounding box, and display them on a map

parameters.name: bl_lng
parameters.description: The bottom left longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: tr_lat
parameters.description: The top right latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: bl_lat
parameters.description: The bottom left latitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: tr_lng
parameters.description: The top right longitude of the bounding box

parameters.name: type
parameters.description: The value of 'Code' field returned in .../aircrafts/list endpoint

parameters.name: speed
parameters.description: Filter by speed. The format is min,max . Ex : 0,460

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description: The value of 'ICAO' field returned in .../airlines/list endpoint

parameters.name: altitude
parameters.description: Filter by altitude. The format is min,max . Ex : 0,48000

parameters.name: airport
parameters.description: The value of 'icao' field returned in .../airports/list endpoint

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of flights per response (max 300)

api_list.name: aircrafts/list
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flight-radar1.p.rapidapi.com/aircrafts/list"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flight-radar1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: flights/list-by-airline

parameters.name: airline
parameters.description:
The value of 'icao' field returned in .../airlines/list or .../flights/detail endpoint
The value of 'operator' field returned in .../flights/search endpoint

api_list.name: flights/get-playback
api_list.description: Get history traveling data of specific flight

parameters.name: flightId
parameters.description: Value of 'id' OR 'identification/id' field returned in .../flights/detail or .../flights/get-more-info endpoint

parameters.name: timestamp
parameters.description: Value of 'departure' field returned in .../flights/detail OR .../flights/get-more-info endpoint

api_list.name: flights/get-more-info
api_list.description: Get more information of specific aircraft, flight, airline, etc...

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: The value of registration (if fetchBy is 'reg') or default (if fetchBy is 'flight') field returned in .../flights/detail

parameters.name: fetchBy
parameters.description:
One of the following : reg|flight
* reg is used to get specific aircraft info, flight is used to get specific flight or airline info

api_list.name: flights/detail
api_list.description: Get detailed information of specific flight

parameters.name: flight
parameters.description: The value of id, flight_id field returned in .../flights/list-in-boundary or .../flights/list-most-tracked endpoint

api_list.name: flights/list-most-tracked
api_list.description: Return the most tracked flights around the world
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://flight-radar1.p.rapidapi.com/flights/list-most-tracked"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "flight-radar1.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: flights/search

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Aircraft number, flight code, airline code, etc...

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: The number of items per response (max 25)
